events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I no longer want to keep it.
The case has been categorized under the refund cluster based on the customer's request for returning the item and getting money back.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle your request regarding the jacket return and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been used or washed since purchase?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 123456789, and the jacket has not been worn or washed yet.
You are eligible for a full refund since the jacket is unused. Please use the prepaid return label we will email to you shortly.
Great, thanks for the clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today using the prepaid label you provide.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your card within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been successfully processed and you have no further questions, we will now close this support case. Thank you!
